channel.title: How do i remove this?!
channel.description:
ok i was on my forums today and i was looking at the top of my forums and i saw this annoying smf forums thing and wanted to know how i remove it
[img]http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/9180/removerq0.png[/img]
i want to get rid of the thing in red, i tried just deleting the image, doesent work, its somewhere in the php does anybody know how i can get rid of it?
Thanks.

item.title: How do i remove this?!
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

…

its in the php, what you said doesent take off the thing that says

‘simple machines forum’

Read full topic

item.title: How do i remove this?!
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

go on to the admin settings and look for forum settings then change the forum title

Read full topic
